0: Right now I can see it so vivid
1: Like it was just yesterday like I could relive it
2: Me and my grandparents on a field trip
3: And I'm the little kid tryna touch the exhibits
4: But it'll fade before I get to get a hold of that
5: Man I wish I could stop time like a photograph

7: Man (man), I wouldn't let a moment pass
8: What do it mean when you dream that you fallin'
9: What do it mean when you dream that you ballin'
10: What do it mean when you never dream at all then
11: And you don't really know cause you can't recall them
12: It's sorta fly you get a chance to say hi to
13: People you never got a chance to say bye to
14: Maybe you could pull em up outta your dreams
15: Into real life (real life), if you try to
16: So close (so close), but so far (so far)
17: And so far (so far), no cigar (no cigar)
18: We can't dwell on the past all we got is today
19: So I'mma live like it's no tomorrow
title: Good Night
